phrases: A neutral country of 17 million people.
It is a world of magic.
Magic is bought and sold there every day.
It is an integral part of people's lives.
And there are those who use magic as their occupation.
Those people are referred to as wizards.
The wizards belong to various guilds and perform jobs on commission.
There are a large number of guilds within the country.
And in a certain city there lies a certain guild.
A guild from which various legends were once born...
Or rather, will continue to be born long into the future...
I will gather all the light, and shine down on your tomorrow!
Until your heart can hear it...
Are you sure you are not forgetting something?
When you are not here to make me laugh,
even what I am looking for cannot be found.
Snowing, be honest with yourself and smile,
because when two people lay close, time overlaps.
I will gather all the light, and shine down on your tomorrow!
Why the heck do I have to go with you?
I want you two to lend me your strength.
We are going to stop their evil plan!
So this is the true form of Lullaby?
It is already been two days since they passed by here.
That is plenty of time to reach Magnolia from here.
I wonder if something happened to them?
Anyway, let us go back and give our report.
We are not going after them?
Both of them are Fairy Tail wizards.
And we have received a notice from the Council, too...
Well, I was planning on going after them, but...
That path went deep into Clover Canyon.
Even experienced hunters from Hunter Guilds cannot get out once they loose their bearings.
Well, Master is with them, so it should not be a problem, but...
You are lost again, are not you?
We have been walking and walking, but we have not gotten to Magnolia yet!
This place is known as Web Valley, as it is filled with innumerable fissures from an ancient earthquake.
As was mentioned before, it is said a great number of souls have gotten lost here, never to return.
I do not care if it is your first time or your last; the fact is, we are lost!
It is only making me hungrier!
Well I am hungry and that is that!
Then stop going on about it already!
It sounds like your stomach just went gu...
It is the legendary delicacy, the winged fish!
Yum, yum, yum, yum, yum, yum!
You are all way too hungry.
Just when you think you have hooked one, it is gone.
I am going to do my best!
They do not really look all that tasty to me, however...
At this rate, it does not matter as long as they are edible.
I want to eat a winged fish!
But I could not catch even one...
In the end we only got one...
I cannot just eat it by myself...
If we split it up, it will only make us hungrier!
Sure seems like he is enjoying that fish there...
It does seem really quiet for a village.
Maybe they are taking an afternoon nap.
We are so hungry, we are about to faint!
That is a little blunt, you famished cat.
Are they really all taking a nap?
Or maybe the whole village got drunk, and they are all passed out?
I think you are talking about Fairy Tail...
As long as I can get my strength back, I will eat anything!
Hey, you are not considering robbing the place, are you?
You had the same idea, did not you?
Give us something to eat, please!
Yup, there is no one here.
It looks like they were just eating.
Where did the people in this house disappear to?
We must investigate this village first.
You must hold out until then.
Erza, your stomach is overruling you.
Not convincing at all, I see.
Natsu and Gray, go search for mushrooms or something!
Do not touch the food in the village!
Master and I will investigate what is going on in the village!
And we finally found some good looking food...
I are not going to be satisfied with mushrooms!
Natsu's going to eat a poisonous one like those laughing shrooms.
It is one of his signature gags!
What are you talking about, Happy?
I are not going to do a dumb joke like that...
I think I can fill up just on mushrooms, as long as I eat enough of them.
Fine, then hurry and pick them.
I am just as surprised myself!
I guess they were not laughing shrooms...
What is all the fuss about?
What the heck is with that mushroom?
You should talk with a giant friggin' mushroom growin' out of your head!
Trying to spruce up your image?
Why are not they worried about themselves?
Did you just laugh at me?
And you are snickering like a damn fool!
Do not fight with mushrooms growing out of your heads!
There is no one here, as we thought.
Despite there being evidence that people had just been living here.
This is not a normal crack between the rocks.
It seems to have some purpose.
Hey, you are acting like idiots!
Lucy, I found an extra big one!
But does not that look a bit suspicious?
One of these'd last us for two days!
Why do not you two do something about the mushrooms on your heads?
I guess everyone ends up like this.
I wonder how the people from the village ate them?
They all must have been like us!
I bet the name of that village is Mushroom Village!
It is not as funny the second time!
That is not the problem, here!
I think your mushroom is growing.
Why does Natsu get all the good gags?
There is a second seam here.
Happy, you are the only one who still has one.
It is funny, but why is the joke on me?!
That is the first time a house ever waved at me!
That is what your focused on?
I do not get this at all!
Master, that was a magic circle!
All those seams you found were part of a magic circle.
And that magic circle is the catalyst to activate the long banned sealing magic, Alive!
It is as you see it.
A magic that turns formerly inanimate objects into living, moving creatures.
The people of the village activated such forbidden magic,
but they ended up as food for the monsters, not the other way around.
But why would they do something so dangerous?
This is a dark guild's village.
When I investigated the she would at that first house, I found a number of magical tools.
And not a one of them was for good.
They are probably plotting something evil and did themselves in.
Gramps, what are you talking about?
I did say that these things were alive, yes?
Do not stand there naked with a creepy grin!
At this rate we cannot be picky about taste!
Do not forget to save me some!
You have any idea who you are dealin' with?
I am the number one flame-griller in all of Fairy Tail!
Iron Fist of the Fire Dragon!
First, we cook'them nice and thorough...
Iron Fist of the Fire Dragon!
Steam them covered for a bit.
Should not really have dessert right off the bat, but beggars cannot be choosers.
It is a close call which is more gross, a winged fish or a chair, but...
Each stick should be around 5 cm long.
With the width of 4 mm, that is the way.
You are taking this too seriously!
Iron Fist of the Fire Dragon!
It is not like you can eat a chair.
Why did you try and make me eat it first?
I am sure he will handle it himself.
Well, I guess it is time to try a piece.
There is gross, and then there is this!
It is not something one would call, edible.
Do not say that after you made me eat it!
Why did not anyone stop that thing?
It does not matter how hungry we are, we cannot eat this.
I guess that is what we get for trying to eat monsters.
Now that I realize I cannot eat it, I am really getting hungry!
To hell with friendship, to hell with my pals!
I will blow you all away at once!
Wing Slash of the Fire Dragon!
Gate of the Golden Bull, I open thee!
Nice body as always, I see!
There is no end to them.
That is not the issue here!
You have been focusing on the weirdest things!
Then stop showin' off with those wings of yours!
I do not get what happened at all.
I do not accept your explanation of what happened before.
We made a magical circle, and a monster appeared.
All of us were Taken Over by it.
So you were all inside those monsters?
I ate a little of it!
When you outsiders entered the village,
That magic circle is no longer active!
Do not sweat the details, my boy!
Anyway, you all should just be happy that the Take Over has been undone.
If you learn from this harsh lesson and never act in such a reckless manner again, I will refrain from informing the council!
I never want to experience this again!
We will never do it again.
I thought that after we defeated the monsters we triggered a switch in the magic circle that would cause it to self-destruct.
In an instant you saved us, and undid the Take Over spell on the dark guild members.
And erased the magic circle itself.
Let us ride on a tin horse, just the two of us.
It is sad that my beloved doll cannot talk to me...
Every time I think of you tears start to flow...
I am a crybaby, are not I?
In the moon (the moon) at night (at night)
I am at a loss for words (Hey!
so much it is like I am under a spell.
from which I will never awaken.
I am at a loss for words (Hey!
since I have completely fallen in love.
I wonder what spell I could chant,
I just love you like crazy!
One day I want to be able to tell you
There is nothing more to say!
Natsu and Erza are actually going to fight?
Natsu has always hated to lose.
It is okay not to stop them?
Do not worry, they do this all the time.
Anyway, who do you think will win, Lucy?
But then again I hope Natsu does not lose either...
Why do not you challenge Erza for the title of strongest female wizard?
But I might be able to beat Happy...
